field.name: static_filters
field.label:
Static Field Filters
(applied regardless of current item)
field.description:
These field filters apply a STATIC filtering, regardless of current item being displayed.
Enter like:
field_id##value %% field_id##value %%
e.g.
22##14 %% 47##some field value %% 19##someword

for single values use:
field_id##value1

for ranges use:
field_id##value1---value2

for multiple values use:
field_id##value1+++value2+++value3

field.name: mod_image_custom_display
field.label: Field HTML as Image
field.description:
You can use the HTML produced by any custom field in place of image.
-- Leave blank: to use the above drop-down select box value,
-- Note: image size and other parameters are not used,
-- Write: like fieldname##varname e.g. for image fields use: imgfieldname##display_small, imgfieldname##display_medium, imgfieldname##display_large

field.name: mod_image_custom_url
field.label: Field URL as Image
field.description:
You can use the URL produced by any custom field in place of image.
-- Leave blank: to use the above drop-down select box value,
-- Note: image size and other parameters are applied to the given URL,
-- Write: like fieldname##varname e.g. for image fields use: imgfieldname##display_small_src, imgfieldname##display_medium_src, imgfieldname##display_large_src
